attributes.action: Give Self Employed Full Pay Through HMRC (COVID-19)
attributes.additional_details: Everyone will be struggling during the times of COVID-19 but why should people who world their socks off as self-employed not get any pay in this time. It’s truly horrible.
attributes.background: Pay people who work 0 hour contracts or 9 hour contracts a good pay otherwise they will end up struggling to cope.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303345

Since you started your petition the Government has announced support for self-employed individuals: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/chancellor-gives-support-to-millions-of-self-employed-individuals

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
